statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date, market_trend FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE market_trend LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE market_trend = 'Positive' AND feedback_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;

SELECT MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_feedback_count DESC, latest_feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT trend_category, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_category, trend_description, trend_date FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100 AND feedback_rating < 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(feedback_rating), COUNT(feedback_id) FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND trend_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT trend_category, COUNT(trend_id) FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY trend_category ORDER BY COUNT(trend_id) DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, date_recorded FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_category = 'Technology';
SELECT innovation_name, innovation_date FROM ProductInnovation WHERE innovation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, date_recorded FROM CustomerFeedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT innovation_name, innovation_description FROM ProductInnovation WHERE innovation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, date_recorded FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT trend_name, industry_sector FROM market_trends WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT innovation_name, launch_date FROM product_innovation WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, date_received FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT trend_name, industry_sector FROM market_trends WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT innovation_name, description FROM product_innovation WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT innovation_name FROM ProductInnovation WHERE innovation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT analysis_date, sector_name FROM FeedbackAnalysis JOIN IndustrialSector ON FeedbackAnalysis.sector_id = IndustrialSector.sector_id WHERE analysis_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT innovation_name, innovation_date FROM ProductInnovation ORDER BY innovation_date DESC;
SELECT sector_name, sector_description FROM IndustrialSector WHERE sector_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT feedback_id, trend_name, innovation_name, sector_name FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
